    • processArrival

      private void processArrival()
      If the server is IDLE then it will create an DEPARTURE event, otherwise it will enqueue the event in the customers queue

    • processDeparture

      private void processDeparture()
      Records departure time, if any customer is waiting then create new departure event and record waiting time, otherwise set the server status to IDLE
